participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and caring, with a passion for learning and self-improvement.
participant_1.background: I'm looking for a way to help my dog with his behavioral issues. I still remember the feeling of freedom I felt when I would dance in my room alone. My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job. Every day I go swimming at the Y. I enjoy listening to music that inspires me to work hard and achieve my goals.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Friendly and adventurous, with a love for cooking and making new friends.
participant_2.background: I wake up early to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army. My favorite animal is the koala. I am a chef. I don’t have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends as soccer in the fall. I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.

content.text: What's your favorite animal?
My favorite animal is the koala!
Really? Why?
I think they're so cute and cuddly!
I've never seen a koala in person.
Oh, you should! They're really amazing animals.
I guess I'll have to add that to my bucket list.
You should! They're so cute and cuddly!
Where are they from?
They're from Australia.
Oh, that's right! I forget about Australia sometimes.
It's okay! They're a pretty unique animal.
So what do they eat?
They eat eucalyptus leaves.
Oh, that's interesting.
Yeah, they're the only animals that can eat eucalyptus leaves.
I'm learning so much about koalas today!
Me too! I love learning about animals.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about all the different species out there.
Yeah, it really is!
I'm glad we're talking about koalas.
Me too! They're so cute
